name: Telegram Dating Lounge
tagline: Active dating and hookup group with verification and meetup coordination
description: Telegram Dating Lounge is one of the more established dating groups on Telegram, offering a space for adults to connect for casual dating and hookups. The group uses a verification system with photo verification to reduce catfishing. Regional sub-groups help connect people in the same area. Active moderation keeps spam and scams to a minimum.
